phrase.text: May Jupiter bless you, Boadicea. Our noble emperor has sent me to announce the increase in taxes that your people must pay to Rome, for the good of civilization...
We shall give you nothing more, Roman! The Iceni shall stand for it no longer!
You foolish barbarians! The empire will crush you like ants! May the wrath of Jupiter fall upon you!
I fear neither your emperor nor your puny gods! After dealing with you, I will capture Camulodunum and drive all Romans off our island!
